item.title: Hugo - Displaying Images the Medium way
item.description: Please ignore the \ in front of { in code examples. It is used to prevent Hugo from processing the shortcodes even in code block The Markdown way ![alt title](1_nHC2UMz-xJM-lvPPwSh_vQ.webp) Though it is recommended, the alt-title is optional. The above can be expressed as ![alt title](path-to-image.jpg) Pros: Simple Natively markdown Cons: No caption Center alignment not guaranteed The Medium way {{\< figure src="1_nHC2UMz-xJM-lvPPwSh_vQ.webp" caption="optional caption" \>}} optional caption Pros: Support caption, plain text and markdown Center alignment Cons:
